field.description: Enter the port that iperf will listen for connections on. (Default is 5001.)
Choose whether to use TCP or UDP here. (Default is TCP.)
Choose to display output in bits/sec or bytes/sec. (Default is bits.)
Enter the desired interval between bandwidth, jitter and loss reports here. (Default is 0 for no periodic reports.)
Enter the length of buffers to read or write here. (Default 8KB for TCP, 1470B for UDP.)
Enter the desired socket buffer size, if needed.
